column1: barbara j. kines| barbara j. kines. died: june 10
column4: 2015 barbara j. (nee newman) kines beloved wife of the late c. rodgers kines; devoted mother of dwight r. kines (janet)

column10: timothy & tyler; loving sister of sandra aldrich and cherished cousin of susan baker. visitation on friday
